info.title: CMPLR API Documentation
info.description: Welcome to the CMPLR API Documentation!

get.description: Get the blogs that the requested blog is currently blocking. The requesting user must be an admin of the blog to retrieve this list.

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Any blog identifier

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Block number to start at

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of blocks to retrieve, 1-20, inclusive

description.example: Mr. Karp is tall and skinny, with unflinching blue eyes a mop of brown hair.\r\nHe speaks incredibly fast and in complete paragraphs.

post.description: Block a blog by sending its identifier

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Your blog identifier

delete.description: Remove a block by sending its identifier

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Your blog identifier

post.description: Block a list of blogs by sending their identifiers

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Your blog identifier

get.description: This method can be used to check if one of your blogs is followed by another blog
This method can be used to get followers for specific Blog

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return: 1â€“20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Result to start at

get.description: This method can be used to retrieve the publicly exposed list of blogs that a blog follows, in order from most recently-followed to first.

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Any blog identifier

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Followed blog index to start at

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to retrieve, 1-20, inclusive

description.example: Mr. Karp is tall and skinny, with unflinching blue eyes a mop of brown hair.\r\nHe speaks incredibly fast and in complete paragraphs.

get.description: This method returns general information about the blog, such as the title, number of posts, and other high-level data.

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Any blog identifier

description.example: Mr. Karp is tall and skinny, with unflinching blue eyes a mop of brown hair.\r\nHe speaks incredibly fast and in complete paragraphs.

get.description: This method can be used to retrieve the publicly exposed likes from a blog.

parameters.name: blog-identifier
parameters.description: Any blog identifier

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Block number to start at

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of blocks to retrieve, 1-20, inclusive

get.description: user can get the posts published by certain blog

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your OAuth Consumer Key

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of post to return one of the following: text, quote, link, answer, video, audio, photo, chat

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A specific post ID

parameters.name: tag[]
parameters.description: Limits the response to posts with all these specified tag(s),

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of posts to return

parameters.name: reblog_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return reblog information

parameters.name: notes_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return notes information

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return notes information default none

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: there are different types of layout for posts

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: the state of the post. Specify one of the following: published, draft, queue, private

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tags for this post

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The GMT date and time of the post, as a string

parameters.name: source_url
parameters.description: A source attribution for the post content

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Add a short text summary to the end of the post URL

parameters.name: send_to_twitter
parameters.description: Whether or not to share this via any connected Twitter account on post publish

parameters.name: is_private
parameters.description: Whether this should be a private answer, if this is an answer.

parameters.name: send_to_facebook
parameters.description: Whether or not to share this via any connected Facebook account on post publish

parameters.name: parent_tumnlrlog_uuid
parameters.description: the unique public identifier of the tumblelog thatâ€™s being reblogged from

parameters.name: parent_post_id
parameters.description: the unique public post Id bing reblogged

parameters.name: hide_trail
parameters.description: whether or not to hide the reblog trail with this new post

parameters.name: exclide_tral_items
parameters.description: reblog trail items

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the post to edit

parameters.name: all request parameters from post creation route are expected

get.description: user can get the posts that had been queued

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies the post format to return(Html,MarkDown,Rich)

post.summary: reorder a post within the queue

parameters.name: insert_after
parameters.description: Which post ID to move it after, or 0 to make it the first post

get.description: user can get the draft posts

parameters.name: before_id
parameters.description: Return posts that have appeared before this ID

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies the post format to return(Html,MarkDown,Rich)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Post number to start at

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies the post format to return(Html,MarkDown,Rich)

id.description: The ID of the submitted post

slug.description: Short text summary to the end of the post URL

type.description: The type of post. One of the following: text, photo, quote, link, video

date.description: The GMT date and time of the post

timestamp.description: The time of the post, in seconds since the epoch

state.description: Indicates the current state of the post (submission)

reblog_key.description: The reblog key for the post

post_author.description: Author of post, only available when submission is not anonymous

is_anonymous.description: Indicates if the  post is a anonymous

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the post to delete

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the reblogged post

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: comment added to the reblogged post

get.description: This method can be used to get notes for specific post

parameters.name: before_timestamp
parameters.description: Fetch notes created before this timestamp

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The response formatting mode {all , likes , conversation , rollup ,reblogs_with_tags }

get.description: This method can be used to  retrieve the userâ€™s account information that matches the OAuth credentials submitted with the request

likes.description: The total count of the user's likes

name.description: the short name of the blog

primary.description: indicates if this is the user's primary blog

followers.description: total count of followers for this blog

tweet.description: indicate if posts are tweeted auto, Y, N

facebook.description: indicate if posts are sent to facebook Y, N

type.description: indicates whether a blog is public or private

get.description: This method can be used to  retrieve the userâ€™s dashboard that matches the OAuth credentials submitted with the request

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return: 1â€“20, inclusive

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Post number to start at

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of post to return. Specify one of the following: text, photo, quote, link, chat, audio, video, answer

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Return posts that have appeared after this ID; Use this parameter to page through the results: first get a set of posts, and then get posts since the last ID of the previous set.

parameters.name: reblog_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return reblog information (specify true or false). Returns the various reblogged_ fields.

parameters.name: notes_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return notes information (specify true or false). Returns note count and note metadata.

get.description: retrieve the posts liked by the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the number of posts to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of the liked post to start from

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Retrieve posts liked before the specified timestamp

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Retrieve posts liked after the specified timestamp

get.summary: Retrieve the Blogs a User Is Following
get.description: Used to return the blogs followed by the user, and info about those blogs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the number of blogs to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of the post to start from
